text: Shobhanam is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by KS Sivachandran and starring MG Soman and Anusha in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Anusha * Indrans * KPAC Sunny * Kuttyedathi Vilasini * MG Soman * Mala Aravindan * Meena (Old) * Poojappura Ravi * Rajeev Rangan * Romi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Shobhanam
